name: Hide Related Products in WooCommerce
author: Basit Ansari

sections.description:
Don’t want to show Related Products in your WooCommerce store ? Hide them with this plugin.

After Installing this plugin, Related Products from your product page will be removed. You can contact me on my website for further support.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload hide-related-products.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You are done.
